text:
The Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador is the first minister, head of government and de facto chief executive for the Canadian province of Newfoundland and Labrador.
The Premier is appointed by the Lieutenant Governor of Newfoundland and Labrador, as representative of the Queen in Right of Newfoundland and Labrador. He or she is usually the leader of the party that commands a majority in the House of Assembly.
The current Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador is Dwight Ball, since December 14, 2015.

annotations.surface_form: Lieutenant Governor of Newfoundland and Labrador
Queen in Right of Newfoundland and Labrador
